maqras.text: 37|83|haey pitabrakd nasa  knongchamnaom anak del tam meakra  robsa nuo h ku ai pr hi m .
37|84|( chaur changcha) nowpel delke( ai pr hi m) ban mk chuob  mcheasa robsa ke daoy chetd brisotth .
37|85|( chaur changcha) nowpel delke ban pol towkean aupouk  robsa ke ning krom robsa ke tha  tae puok anak kampoungte korp sakkar avei
37|86|tae puok anak chng korp sakkar mcheasa phe  sa ng pi a l laoh daembi  bradit phout kohk ryy
37|87|dau che  neah  tae puok anak kit avei champoh mcheasa krobkrong piphp teang  asa
37|88|ruochamk ke( ai pr hi m) ban samlung meul tow hvaung phkay  muoyosrabk .
37|89|haey ke kaban pol tha  pitabrakd nasa khnhom chhu .
37|90|pelnoh  puokke kaban berokhnang chakchenh pi ke .
37|91|banteabmk ke daersaamdawtow rk preah neanea robsa puokke haey  ban pol tha  tae puok eng min briphok te ryy
37|92|hetoaveibeanchea puok eng min niyeay
37|93|haey ke ka daertow chit puokvea( preah neanea)  daoy veay  nung daisdam robsa ke( yeang khlang) .
37|94|pelnoh  puokke ban daersaamdawtow rk ke yeang rhsa .
37|95|ke ban pol tha  tae puok anak korp sakkar nouv avei del puok  anak chhlak
37|96|khn del a l laoh ban bangkeut puok anak ning avei del puok anak  kampoung thveu noh ryy
37|97|puokke ban niyeay knea tha  chaur puok anak sang saamnng muoy  samreab ke  haey baoh ke chaul tow knong phleung da kdaw noh choh .
37|98|dauchnaoh  puokke mean bamnng rieb koumrong akrak champoh ke te  yeung kaban thveu aoy puokke teabthaok .
37|99|haey ke kaban pol tha  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom nung towkean  mcheasa robsakhnhom del trong nung changaoulobangheanh khnhom .
37|100|ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum trong me tda bratan aoy khnhom( nouv kaun  brosa) del sthet knongchamnaom anak del sang ampeula troemotrauv phng .
37|101|haey yeung ban phdal damnoeng rikreay dl ke ampi kaunobrosa  mneak del atthmot bamphot( ai sma ai l) .

37|102|haey nowpel delke( ai sma ai l) krob ayou ach  daer cheamuoy keat ban noh  keat ban pol tha  ao kaunosamleanh. pit  brakd nasa  yeung ban soben kheunhtha  yeung pitchea trauv saamleh  eng .  dau che  neah  chaur eng pichearna meulchoh  tae eng ylkheunh yeangdauch  me  d ch?  ai sma ai l l ban chhlaey tha  ao aupouk cheatisrleanh robsakhnhom. saum  lokaupouk anouvotd tam avei delke ban banhchea choh . brasenbae  a l laoh mean chetnea  lokaupouk nung kheunh khnhom sthet knongchamnaom anak del atthmot cheaminkhan .
37|103|haey nowpel delke teangpir ban ylprom(thveuteam  batobanhchea a l laoh)  ruoch keat kaban phe  d k ai sma ai l phkabmoukh towleu  dei( daembi saamleh) .
37|104|pelnoh yeung ban haw ke tha  ao ai pr hi m
37|105|anak pitchea ban bampenh tam soben( robsa anak) haey .  pitabrakd nasa  yeung ka tabasnang dauchnaoh der  champoh anak del sang  ampeula .
37|106|pitabrakd nasa  nih kuchea karsaakalbong muoy yeang  chbasaleasa .
37|107|haey yeung ban sangkroh ke( ai sma ai l) daoy bdaur nung  kar saamleh satv muoy da thom .
37|108|haey yeung bansaoltouk rueng robsa ke( chea kar romluk da la)  dl anak chomnean kraoy .
37|109|saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean dl ai pr hi m .
37|110|dauchnaoh der  yeung tabasnang champoh anak del sang ampeula .
37|111|pitabrakd nasa  ke( ai pr hi m) sthet knongchamnaom khnhom  robsa yeung del mean chomnue .
37|112|yeung ban phdal damnoeng rikreay dl ke nouv ai sa ha kchea  na pi mneak del sthet knongchamnaom anak del sang ampeula troemotrauv .
37|113|yeung ban bratan porchy towdl ke  ning ai sa ha k .  haey knongchamnaom kaunchaw robsa ke teangpir mean anak del la troemotrauv  ning anak del bampean leu khluoneng da chbasaleasa .
37|114|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bratan nie k meat  towleu mou sa ning ha rau n .
37|115|haey yeung ban sangkroh ke teangpir  ning krom robsa ke  teangpir aoy ruochphot pi kroh m h nd reay da thngonthngor .
37|116|haey yeung ban chuoy puokke  haey puokke kaban klaycha  puok del mean chychomneah .
37|117|haey yeung ban phdal aoy ke teangpir nouv kompir da chbasa  leasa .
37|118|haey yeung changaoulobangheanh dl ke teangpir nouv meakra da troem  trauv .
37|119|haey yeung bansaoltouk rueng robsa ke teangpir( chea kar  romluk da la) dl anak chomnean kraoy .
37|120|saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean champoh mousaea  ning ha rou n .
37|121|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ka tabasnang dauchnaoh der champoh  anak del sang ampeula .
37|122|pitabrakd nasa  ke teangpir ku sthet knongchamnaom khnhom robsa  yeung del mean chomnue .
37|123|haey pitabrakd nasa  ai l yeasa kuchea anakneasar  mneak knongchamnaom anakneasar teanglay .
37|124|( chaur changcha) nowpel delke ban pol towkean krom  robsa ke( ambaur aisreael) tha  tae puok anak min kaotakhlach a l laoh  te ryy
37|125|tae puok anak korp sakkar champoh roubsaamnak hpa k lan  haey puok anak baohbngchaol( karkorp sakkar) anak del bangkeut  da brasaer cheangke
37|126|khn del a l laoh  kuchea mcheasa robsa puok anak  ning chea  mcheasa robsa chidaunchitea chomnean moun robsa puok anak noh
37|127|te puokke bercha ban bdeseth nung ke( ai l yeasa)tow  vinh .  dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa puokke nung trauv ke bramoulophdom(thveu  tearounakamm)
37|128|leuklengte banda khnhom robsa a l laoh del mean chetd smaoh  trang bonnaoh .
37|129|haey yeung bansaoltouk rueng robsa ke( chea kar romluk da la)  dl anak chomnean kraoy .
37|130|saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean champoh ai l yea sai n .
37|131|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ka tabasnang dauchnaoh der champoh anak  del sang ampeula .
37|132|pitabrakd nasa  ke ku sthet knongchamnaom khnhom robsa yeung  del mean chomnue .
37|133|haey pitabrakd nasa  lout kuchea anakneasar mneak knong  chamnaom anakneasar teanglay .
37|134|( chaur changcha) nowpel del yeung ban sangkroh ke ning krom  kruosaear robsa ke teangoasaknea
37|135|leuklengte sdrei chrea mneak( braponth robsa ke)bonnaoh  del sthet knongchamnaom anak del trauv tearounakamm .
37|136|banteabmk  yeung ban bamphlanh anak dteitiet .
37|137|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok anak thveudamnaer chhlangkat ( phoumisrok) puokke chea riengreal pruk
37|138|ning peloyb .  dau che  neah  tae puok anak min kitpichearna  te ryy
37|139|haey pitabrakd nasa  you nou sa kuchea anakneasar mneak knong  chamnaom anakneasar teanglay .
37|140|( chaur changcha) nowpel delke ban rtkech chaul tow knong  saampow del penh daoy bantouk .
37|141|kraoyomk ke ban phsaangsaamnang  pelnoh ke ka sthet knong  chamnaom anak del chanh knong kar phsaangsaamnang( daoy trauv ke baoh chaul  tow knong samoutr) .
37|142|ruochamk trei da thom muoy ban leb ke  khn delke kuchea anak  del trauv ke sdeibantosa .
37|143|dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa brasenbae ke minmen chea anak  del sthet knongchamnaom anak del sarsaer leuk t meu  k ng yeung te noh
37|144|ke brakadchea sthetnow knong poh trei da thom noh  rhautadl thngai  delke thveu aoy rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh( thngai barlok) .
